mapper.sql: CATEGORY_OID, CATEGORY_DESC, MONTHLY_BUDGET, PARENT_OID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, SEQ_NO
mapper.update:
UPDATE CATEGORY
CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
MONTHLY_BUDGET = #{monthlyBudget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_OID = #{parentOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE CATEGORY_OID = #{categoryOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MONTHLY_BUDGET = #{monthlyBudget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENT_OID = #{parentOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE CATEGORY_OID = #{categoryOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
